examples.behavior.fitness

Class AlternativeFitnessFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • examples.behavior.fitness.BehaviorFitnessFunction
      • examples.behavior.fitness.AlternativeFitnessFunction

  • public class AlternativeFitnessFunction
extends BehaviorFitnessFunction
    This class represents an alternative to the classic fitness function ClassicFitnessFunction. It was not used for final benchmarks but stays in in the project as an example.
    Author:
    Johannes Wortmann

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AlternativeFitnessFunction() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyFoodConsumedBonus()
      Adjusts the current fitness value of the evaluated individual by applying a bonus in case of consumed food.
      void applyNoMovementPenalty()
      Adjusts the current fitness value of the evaluated individual by applying a penalty in case of no movement of the agent.
      void applyValidMovementBonus()
      Adjusts the current fitness value of the evaluated individual by applying a bonus in case of a valid movement of the agent.
      void applyWalkIntoWallPenalty()
      Adjusts the current fitness value of the evaluated individual by applying a penalty in case of an attempt of the agent to walk into a wall.
      void resetFitnessScorePerMap()
      This resets the current value of the fitness score (remember to call)

      • Methods inherited from class examples.behavior.fitness.BehaviorFitnessFunction

        getCurrentScore

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
